review: A game has never made manual labour so fun!Side note: I've developed an insatiable hunger for quartz
In a game full of sexualized nurses, school girls and cats, I play the giant saxophone black guy.
This is a soap opera masquerading as a fighting game.This is the best soap opera I've ever been bodied in.10/10 would attempt a halfcircle forward after a quatercircle back again.
Can't romance Keith David, 0/10.At least they give you Kinze...
Despite the ♥♥♥♥♥torm that was Crimefest Day 1, the game has still retained the majority of its charm and playability. Despite the microtransactions, it is still an entertaining game.
